outputs.output_descr: The Parliamentary Action on Renewable Energy project aims to build the capacity of parliamentarians to strengthen their advocacy and monitoring on renewable energy and to promote policy and regulatory reform to encourage investment in renewable energy.

Output 1: Legislators informed on climate change risks, and political will to support renewables enhanced.
Output 2: Legislators have access to knowledge and support through peer networks.
Output 3: Legislators capacity to advance policy proposals, replicate successful policies and best practices, and monitor implementation enhanced.
Output 4: Parliamentarians overview of policy options for promoting renewables strengthened, and information on how to develop policy strengthened, through dispersion of renewable energy handbook.
